title: elago R1 Intelli Case [Black]-[Magnet Technology][Heavy Shock Absorption][Lanyard Included] for apple TV Remote
feature: DESIGN: Perfect fit for Apple 4th and 5th TV Remote
MATERIAL: Made from durable and soft silicone, the Intelli Case adds great grip and drop protection. Lanyard included.
MAGNET TECHNOLOGY: Powerful magnets are in the Intelli Case to allow you to attach the remote to any metal surface including some televisions - never lose your remote again!
FULL ACCESS: All functions of the remote are open for use; dual microphones, glass touch surface, buttons, and port for charging are all open for direct access.
DISCLAIMER: Apple TV and Siri Remote are not included.
description: The elago Intelli Case was designed to protect your Apple TV remote and brings great design extras to the table. Durable silicone feels soft to the touch and adds great grip to allow for added security and comfortability when using the remote. As the Intelli Case covers all corners of the remote, it adds great drop protection. Powerful magnets were placed inside the case to allow you to attach the remote to any metal surface; keep your remote on your TV or any metal surface - never lose your remote again! All functions, ports, and devices are easily accessible with the case on. Open cutouts for the dual microphones, direct access to all buttons and glass surface, and the charging/lanyard port can be utilized at all times.
